description: Looking for an easy healthier dinner? Try this light and tasty pan-fried lemon pepper fish with broccoli, green peas, snow peas and quinoa.
keywords: Fish dishes,Fish,Quick & easy dinner,Healthier Easier,Seafood,Jan Feb 2022,Weeknight dinner
name: Lemon Pepper Fish With Green Quinoa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 spring onion, cut into 5cm lengths and thinly sliced lengthways
2 lemons, 1 zested and juiced, 1 cut into wedges
1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Place onion in a bowl of iced water. Set aside until ready to use. Place broccoli in a food processor and process until finely chopped.

Cook quinoa in a large saucepan of boiling water, adding frozen peas and snow peas in the last 1 minute of cooking. Remove pan from heat. Stir in broccoli. Drain. Transfer to a large bowl. Stir in zest, lemon juice and half of the oil. Set aside.
Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Rub seasoning all over fish. Cook fish for 3 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through.
Drain onion. Divide quinoa mixture among plates. Top with fish and onion. Serve with lemon wedges.
